Level1.name: PROTECT FOREVER
Level1.description: Unhook a Survivor safely or take a protection hit 4 time(s) while using the perk We're Gonna Live Forever.

Level1.name: POISED PERFORMANCE
Level1.description: Finish repairing 1 generator(s) and escape the trial while using the perk Poised.

Level1.name: JANE'S VICTORY
Level1.description: Stun the Killer 1 time(s) as Jane Romero.

Level1.name: CRAFT TIME'S OVER
Level1.description: Cleanse 12 Totem(s).

Level1.name: DAVID'S PROTECTION
Level1.description: Take 1 protection hit(s) as David King.

Level1.name: SHINING LIGHT
Level1.description: Earn 5 Lightbringer emblem(s) of Bronze quality or better.

Level1.name: LIBERATOR
Level1.description: Unhook 5 Survivor(s). Must unhook them safely.

Level1.name: GO FOR BROKE
Level1.description: Sabotage 10 hook(s).

Level1.name: THE LAST PLACE YOU LOOK
Level1.description: Unlock 6 chest(s).

Level1.name: ESCAPE ARTIST
Level1.description: Escape 2 trial(s).

Level1.name: ADRENALINE OVERFLOW
Level1.description: Take 1 hit(s) while affected by the Endurance status effect while using the perk Dead Hard.

Level1.name: SPILLING BLOOD
Level1.description: Earn 5 Devout emblem(s) of Bronze quality or better.

Level1.name: GRUESOME
Level1.description: Hook 20 Survivor(s).

Level1.name: BRONZE AGE
Level1.description: Earn 15 emblem(s) of Bronze quality or better.

Level1.name: BRING THE LIGHT
Level1.description: Repair a total of 4 generator(s).

Level1.name: SILVER HERO
Level1.description: Earn 2 emblems of Silver quality or better as a Survivor.

Level1.name: TAKE CHARGE
Level1.description: Damage 4 generator(s) while using the perk Overcharge.

Level1.name: SEALED SHUT
Level1.description: Close the Hatch 1 time(s).

Level1.name: EXECUTION
Level1.description: Kill 10 Survivor(s) by any means.

Level1.name: SILVER BLADE
Level1.description: Earn 2 emblems of Silver quality or better as a Killer.

Level1.name: MAD ABOUT YOU
Level1.description: Inflict Madness I on 2 different Survivor(s) as The Doctor.

Level1.name: PHASE WARRIOR
Level1.description: Hit a Survivor after emerging from phasing 1 time(s) as The Spirit.

Level2.description: Escape 1 trial(s) while using the perk No Mither.

Level2.description: Escape 4 trial(s).

Level2.description: Stun the Killer 4 time(s).

Level2.description: Unhook 8 Survivor(s). Must unhook them safely.

Level2.description: Escape 1 trial(s) as Jane Romero.

Level2.name: TERRIFIED
Level2.description: Make the Survivors scream 10 time(s).
